MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:05pm due to safety concerns onsite and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:18pm on Wednesday, 03 February 2021
